arts.ttl: Granit Xhaka in furious row with Bayer Leverkusen fans after defeat to third-tier team
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen were on the receiving end of a shock loss in the German Cup as the holders were knocked out by a third-tier outfit before Granit Xhaka clashed with a fan

arts.ttl: Former Arsenal star Granit Xhaka is caught in a HEATED clash with Bayer Leverkusen's ultras after shock German Cup exit to third tier minnows
arts.sum: Granit Xhaka was caught in a furious altercation with Bayer Leverkusen fans after his side suffered a shock 2-1 defeat against third-tier German club Arminia Bielefeld.

arts.ttl: European football: Bielefeld stun Leverkusen to reach DFB-Pokal final
arts.sum: Third-tier Arminia Bielefeld send holders tumbling out Paris Saint-Germain avoid scare against Dunkerque Third-tier Arminia Bielefeld stunned the DFB-Pokal holders, Bayer Leverkusen, 2-1 on Tuesday, coming from a goal down to reach the final. Bielefeld, who have eliminated four Bundesliga teams in consecutive rounds in the competition, became the fourth third-tier side to reach the final. “I am so proud of the team,” said the Bielefeld coach, Michél Kniat. “The whole region is feeling this. No one will be sleeping tonight. We defended with a lot of passion and that was the key. We worked extremely hard.” Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Third-tier outfit stun Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen to reach historic first-ever DFB-Pokal final
arts.sum: Third-tier Arminia Bielefeld stun holders Bayer Leverkusen, winning 2-1 in the DFB-Pokal to reach the final of the competition for the first time.

arts.ttl: Sky Sports confirms Liverpool’s interest in versatile defender hailed by Xabi Alonso
arts.sum: Liverpool are actively searching for defensive reinforcements ahead of the summer transfer window, with Bayer Leverkusen’s Piero Hincapie emerging as a prime target. With Virgil van Dijk’s contract situation unresolved and uncertainty surrounding Ibrahima Konaté’s future, the Reds are preparing for potential defensive changes. Several centre-backs have been linked with a move to Anfield, including […] The post Sky Sports confirms Liverpool’s interest in versatile defender hailed by Xabi Alonso appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Arminia Bielefeld coach on sensational semi-final win over Leverkusen: "No one will be sleeping tonight"
arts.sum: Nobody in Bielefeld will be sleeping after Arminia's shock 2-1 DFB-Pokal semi-final win over Bayer Leverkusen, according to the 3. Liga side's coach, Michel Kniat.

arts.ttl: Andrich self-critical after Leverkusen's cup exit: "By far our worst game of the season"
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen were knocked out of the DFB-Pokal against Arminia Bielefeld after putting in their worst performance of the season, according to Robert Andrich.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga club-by-club historical guide: Arminia Bielefeld
arts.sum: Famed for bouncing between the divisions, Arminia Bielefeld share the record for the most Bundesliga promotions and can also boast of several important firsts. The city of Bielefeld is best known for three things: the home of the Dr. Oetker group, the home of Arminia the football club, and for apparently not existing.

arts.ttl: Arminia Bielefeld shock Leverkusen to reach first DFB-Pokal final in club history
arts.sum: 3. Liga side Arminia Bielefeld sensationally knocked German double winners Bayer Leverkusen out of the DFB-Pokal and are in the final for the first time.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Arminia Bielefeld vs. Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: The lineups for Tuesday's DFB-Pokal semi-final clash between Arminia Bielefeld and Bayer Leverkusen have been announced.
